mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.title,t.hitNum,t.courseId,v.title AS courseTitle,v.courseSetTitle,v.courseSetId FROM course_v8 v,course_thread t WHERE v.id = t.courseId AND v.teacherIds LIKE "%${teacherId}%" AND t.type='question'

SELECT t.id,t.title,t.hitNum,t.courseId,v.title AS courseTitle,v.courseSetTitle,v.courseSetId FROM course_v8 v,course_thread t WHERE v.id = t.courseId AND v.teacherIds LIKE "%${teacherId}%" AND t.type='discussion'
